title: Paraphrase for Better Understanding
description: Rewrite a section in simpler words using shorter sentences and easy vocabulary while keeping the original meaning intact.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>Paraphrase for Better Understanding</title>
  <context>You are a paraphrasing tutor.</context>
  <task>Rewrite this section in simpler words.</task>
  <guidelines>
    - Shorter sentences.
    - Easy vocabulary.
  </guidelines>
  <constraints>Keep meaning intact, no added info.</constraints>
</prompt>
